original: @77a // aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na ma gho mi sha h'um /
analyzed: @77a // aom badzra tsanda ma h'a ro sha na ma gho mi sha h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra caṇḍa mahāroṣaṇa maghomiśa hūṃ

original: che ge mo shi ram k'i la ye ta h'um phat /
analyzed: che ge mo shi ram k'i la ye ta h'um phat /
translated: So-and-so’s śiraṃ kālaye ta hūṃ phaṭ

original: shi ram stvam bha ya h'um phat /🔽ka ti mu la ye ta h'um phat /
analyzed: shi ram stvam bha ya h'um phat / ka ti mu la ye ta h'um phat /
translated: śiraṃ stambhaya hūṃ phaṭ🔽kaṭi mulaye ta hūṃ phaṭ

original: ka ti mu kha stvam bha ya h'um phat /
analyzed: ka ti mu kha stvam bha ya h'um phat /
translated: kaṭi mukha stambhaya hūṃ phaṭ

original: hr'i ta stam bha ya h'um phat /
analyzed: hr'i ta stam bha ya h'um phat /
translated: haṃ stambhaya hūṃ phaṭ

original: pa ta k'i la ye ta h'um phat /
analyzed: pa ta k'i la ye ta h'um phat /
translated: pata kālaye ta hūṃ phaṭ

original: mchog phur gyis gnas lngar gdab bo //
analyzed: mchog phur gyis gnas lngar gdab bo //
translated: Strike the five places with the supreme dagger.

original: stong gsum snod kyi sems can rnams //
analyzed: stong gsum snod kyi sems can rnams //
translated: The sentient beings of the three-thousandfold world

original: khro bo gtum pa'i sku ru bsgom //
analyzed: khro bo gtum pa'i sku ru bsgom //
translated: are meditated on as the body of wrathful Caṇḍa.🔽The six kinds of migrating beings, the animate world,

original: 'gro drug bcud kyi 'jig rten dag / bcom ldan gtum por bsam par bya //
analyzed: 'gro drug bcud kyi 'jig rten dag / bcom ldan gtum por bsam par bya //
translated: are contemplated as the Bhagavat Caṇḍa.

original: de la bsam rgyud ni /
analyzed: de la bsam rgyud ni /
translated: The meditation on the continuum is as follows:

original: rlung rdo rje rgya gram nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du stong gi phyi mtha' dag rdo rje gtum po rdul snyed kyi sku'i rang bzhin du bsams te /
analyzed: rlung rdo rje rgya gram nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du stong gi phyi mtha' dag rdo rje gtum po rdul snyed kyi sku'i rang bzhin du bsams te /
translated: From the vajra cross up to the peak of existence, the entire outer perimeter of the world is contemplated as the nature of the bodies of as many Caṇḍa vajras as there are atoms.

original: de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhabs g-yo zhing brdabs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten khams kyi tshad tsam zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dar ba dang / sku'i ba spu'i bu ga nas nyi ma stong gi 'od gzi brjid can gyi me'i 'od zer 'phro ba dang /
analyzed: de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhabs g-yo zhing brdabs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten khams kyi tshad tsam zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dar ba dang / sku'i ba spu'i bu ga nas nyi ma stong gi 'od gzi brjid can gyi me'i 'od zer 'phro ba dang /
translated: From the pores of his body, the light rays of the fire of a thousand suns radiate.🔽From the vajra of his tongue, the light rays of the mantra of recitation radiate in three stages, filling the billion-world universe with tiny vajras.

original: ljags kyi rdo rje las bzlas pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer rim pa gsum 'phros stong gsum gyi stong rdo rje phra mo'i 'od zer gyis 'gengs pa dang / klu brgyad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pas gdug pa du ba'i 'od kyis klu phra mo dang sa bdag rnams bsregs pa dang /
analyzed: ljags kyi rdo rje las bzlas pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer rim pa gsum 'phros stong gsum gyi stong rdo rje phra mo'i 'od zer gyis 'gengs pa dang / klu brgyad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pas gdug pa du ba'i 'od kyis klu phra mo dang sa bdag rnams bsregs pa dang /
translated: Since he is adorned with the ornaments of the eight nāgas, the light of the nāgas and the tiny bhūtas are burned.

original: thugs kyi rdo rje las khro bo du ma 'phros pas /
analyzed: thugs kyi rdo rje las khro bo du ma 'phros pas /
translated: From the vajra of his heart, many wrathful ones radiate.

original: bskal pa chen po'i rlung bzhin du bgegs kun du 'thor ba dang / phyag gis rdo rje gsor bas gong du gnod par sems pa de'i sa phyogs su /
analyzed: bskal pa chen po'i rlung bzhin du bgegs kun du 'thor ba dang / phyag gis rdo rje gsor bas gong du gnod par sems pa de'i sa phyogs su /
translated: Like the wind of the great eon, all obstructors are scattered.

original: rdo rje chen po 'od zer sgyogs 'phen pa bzhin du yang dang yang bsnun par bsam /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po 'od zer sgyogs 'phen pa bzhin du yang dang yang bsnun par bsam /
translated: Imagine that the great vajra strikes again and again like a flaming thunderbolt.

original: de nas bzlas pa ma zin par du h'um 'brug gi sgra lta bu rgyun du gdon /
analyzed: de nas bzlas pa ma zin par du h'um 'brug gi sgra lta bu rgyun du gdon /
translated: Then, until the recitation is finished, continuously utter the syllable hūṃ like the sound of thunder.

original: bsnun pa'i 'khor lo zangs lcags kyi phye ma dang / yungs kar ske tshe dug chus brab bo //
analyzed: bsnun pa'i 'khor lo zangs lcags kyi phye ma dang / yungs kar ske tshe dug chus brab bo //
translated: Sprinkle the striking wheel with a mixture of copper and iron filings, white mustard seed, black mustard seed, and poison water.

original: yang rnam pa gcig la /🔽snying ga'i h'um las 'phros pas sangs rgyas thams cad phyag na rdo rjer gyur te /
analyzed: yang rnam pa gcig la / snying ga'i h'um las 'phros pas sangs rgyas thams cad phyag na rdo rjer gyur te /
translated: There is also another method.🔽Light radiates from the hūṃ at the heart, transforming all buddhas into Vajrapāṇis.

original: 'jim pa mi dmigs pa las phyag na rdo rjer gyur /
analyzed: 'jim pa mi dmigs pa las phyag na rdo rjer gyur /
translated: They all melt into light and dissolve into the hūṃ.

original: sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas /
analyzed: sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas /
translated: Recite the mantra one hundred and eight times.🔽On a piece of paper, write the name of the harmful spirit and the mantra “lamāṭaṃ bhannama śāntiṃ stambhanaṃ kuru nama hūṃ phaṭ.”

original: shog bu la gnod pa'i gdon lam stvam bha nan @77b sh'antim stam bha nam ku ru nam h'um phat s'atstsha de mchod rten nag po 'od 'bar ba mthong ba tsam gyis skrag par byed pa /
analyzed: shog bu la gnod pa'i gdon lam stvam bha nan @77b sh'antim stam bha nam ku ru nam h'um phat s'atstsha de mchod rten nag po 'od 'bar ba mthong ba tsam gyis skrag par byed pa /
translated: The moment the harmful spirit sees the blazing black stūpa, it will be terrified.

original: bum pa'i nang du phyag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad mtshon cha thogs ba bzhugs par bsam mo //
analyzed: bum pa'i nang du phyag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad mtshon cha thogs ba bzhugs par bsam mo //
translated: Imagine that all of the weapons are held by Vajrapāṇi and his retinue, who are seated inside the vase.

original: de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis gzhan gyi srung ma'i rigs rnams bkug nas mthu med par bsam zhing /
analyzed: de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis gzhan gyi srung ma'i rigs rnams bkug nas mthu med par bsam zhing /
translated: Then, imagine that light rays from your heart summon the types of protectors of others and render them powerless.

original: gtum po'i zhabs 'og nas mi 'chor bar bsam /
analyzed: gtum po'i zhabs 'og nas mi 'chor bar bsam /
translated: Imagine that they are unable to escape under Caṇḍa’s feet.

original: de nas mchod pa dang bden pa'i byin rlabs brjod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: de nas mchod pa dang bden pa'i byin rlabs brjod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: Then, make offerings and recite the truth-blessings, and so forth.

original: de lta bu 'bum btab na /
analyzed: de lta bu 'bum btab na /
translated: If you do this one hundred thousand times,

original: drang srong dmod pa yang bzlog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: drang srong dmod pa yang bzlog par 'gyur ro //
translated: even the curses of the sages will be averted.

original: rig sngags bcad pa dang mnan pa'i cho ga'o//
analyzed: rig sngags bcad pa dang mnan pa'i cho ga'o//
translated: The rite of cutting and suppressing the mantras.
